properties.name: server
properties.value: EVALUATE:variables.openapi.servers[1].url

properties.name: infos
properties.value: EVALUATE:(for line in get entries(variables.openapi.paths) return { "path": line.key, "value": get entries(line.value)[item.value.operationId = request.reasoning or item.key = "parameters"] })[count(item.value) > 1 or item.value[1].key != "parameters"][count(item.value) > 0][1]

properties.name: method
properties.value: EVALUATE:variables.infos.value[item.key != "parameters"][1].key

EVALUATE:concatenate(
  flatten(variables.infos.value[item.key = "parameters"].value),
  flatten(variables.infos.value[item.key != "parameters"].value.parameters)
)
EVALUATE:for parameter in variables.parameters return get entries(parameter)
EVALUATE:for parameter in previous return if count(parameter[item.key = "in" and item.value = "path"]) > 0 then parameter else null
EVALUATE:for parameter in previous[item != null] return context(parameter)
EVALUATE:for parameter in variables.parameters return get entries(parameter)
EVALUATE:for parameter in previous return if count(parameter[item.key = "in" and item.value = "query"]) > 0 then parameter else null
EVALUATE:for parameter in previous[item != null] return context(parameter)
EVALUATE:for parameter in variables.parameters return get entries(parameter)
EVALUATE:for parameter in previous return if count(parameter[item.key = "in" and item.value = "header"]) > 0 then parameter else null
EVALUATE:for parameter in previous[item != null] return context(parameter)

properties.name: path
properties.value: EVALUATE:variables.infos.path
EVALUATE:item
EVALUATE:get entries(request.body)[item.key = previous.name][1].value

properties.name: path
properties.value: EVALUATE:replace(variables.path, "\{" + item.name + "\}", previous)
EVALUATE:get entries(variables.infos.value[item.key = variables.method].value.requestBody[1].content)

EVALUATE:if previous[item.key = "application/json"][1] != null then 
  "application/json" 
else if previous[item.key = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"][1] != null then 
  "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
else
  null

properties.name: body
properties.value: EVALUATE:context((for parameter in get entries(request.body) return if count(variables.parametersQuery[item.name = parameter.key]) > 0 then parameter else null)[item != null])

properties.name: body
properties.value: EVALUATE:request.body.body

properties.body: EVALUATE:if variables.method != "get" and variables.method != "head" then variables.body else null
